Text: The Deerslayer, or The First War-path (1841) was the last of James Fenimore Cooper's "Leatherstocking Tales" to be written.

Text: The Deerslayer:  Fenimore Cooper begins his work by relating the astonishing advance of civilization in New York State, which is the setting of four of his five "Leatherstocking Tales".
